hero_subtitle: Fresh, nutritious meals prepared by professional chefs and delivered straight to your door. Start your healthy lifestyle today!

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.description: Simple steps to get delicious, healthy meals delivered to your door

step1.title: CHOOSE YOUR MEALS
step1.description: Rotating menu of 16 balanced dishes per week, over 50 meals per month.

step2.title: WE GET COOKING
step2.description: Whilst you do you. Sit back, relax + let our chefs get the pots simmering.

step3.title: HEAT, EAT & ENJOY
step3.description: No prep. No mess. Our meals arrive ready to heat and eat in minutes.

fresh_meals.main_description: We only use premium ingredients from our network of trusted partners. All meals are Chef-prepared and Dietitian-approved.
fresh_meals.fresh_description: We only use premium ingredients from our network of trusted partners. All meals are Chef-prepared and Dietitian-approved.
fresh_meals.chef_description: Our team of culinary experts craft meals so mouthwatering, you won't believe they're healthy.
fresh_meals.dietitian_description: Our registered dietitians work hand-in-hand with our kitchen to ensure every meal is packed with premium, science-backed nutritional quality.

menu.title: DELICIOUS MEALS CRAFTED FOR YOU
menu.description: Explore our rotating menu of chef-crafted, nutritionist-approved meals. Each dish is carefully designed to deliver exceptional taste and optimal nutrition.
menu.cta_text: Ready to start your healthy journey with delicious meals?

reviews.title: LOVED BY MOROCCO
reviews.description: Discover what our customers across Morocco are saying about their healthy meal experience with PrepMe.
reviews.review1: PrepMe has transformed my busy lifestyle! The meals are incredibly fresh and the Moroccan-inspired flavors remind me of home. Perfect for my hectic schedule in Casablanca.
reviews.review2: As a busy professional in Rabat, I was struggling to eat healthy. PrepMe's nutritious meals have been a game-changer. The quality and taste exceed my expectations!
reviews.review3: The variety is amazing! Each week brings new flavors that satisfy my palate. The traditional Moroccan touches in some dishes make me feel connected to our beautiful culture.
reviews.review4: Living in Fès, I appreciate authentic flavors. PrepMe delivers fresh, healthy meals that respect our culinary heritage while meeting modern nutritional needs.
reviews.review5: From Agadir with love! PrepMe has made healthy eating so convenient. The meals arrive fresh and the packaging is eco-friendly. Highly recommend!
reviews.review6: Tanger resident here! The chef-crafted meals are restaurant-quality. I've never eaten so well while maintaining my fitness goals. Simply exceptional!

about.title: FROM OUR KITCHEN TO YOURS
about.story_opening: Our story started with a simple dream in Morocco. A small kitchen in Casablanca and a hunger for something more. Two passionate entrepreneurs with a very supportive family behind them.
about.story_problem: We noticed how difficult it was for busy professionals to maintain a healthy lifestyle. Long work hours, limited time for meal prep, and the lack of nutritious, convenient options in our beautiful Morocco.
about.story_solution: So we took our grandmother's traditional recipes, combined them with modern nutritional science, and created PrepMe. We started small, cooking fresh meals in our home kitchen and delivering them to friends and colleagues.
about.story_growth: Word spread quickly. Soon we were serving hundreds, then thousands across Morocco. The demand was incredible - people were hungry for healthy, delicious meals that honored our culinary heritage.
about.story_mission: Now, PrepMe has become more than a meal delivery service. We're a movement towards healthier living, supporting local farmers, and celebrating Moroccan flavors in every bite.
about.story_future: This was never just the plan, but it's become our life - to help you live your healthiest, happiest life while staying connected to the flavors that make Morocco special.
about.value1_desc: Premium ingredients, expert preparation, nutritionist-approved recipes
about.value2_desc: Nourishing your body while delighting your taste buds every day
about.value3_desc: Celebrating our rich culinary heritage with modern nutritional wisdom
about.closing_message: We're here to make healthy eating effortless, delicious, and authentically Moroccan.
